Connect to Socket:
nc socket.cryptohack.org 13371

intercept msg:
~~~json
{"p": "", "g": "0x02", "A": ""}
~~~

replace A with own key and send to Bob:
~~~json
{"p": "", "g": "0x02", "A": "0x02"}
~~~

intercept public key from Bob:
~~~json
{"B": ""}
~~~

send own key to alice:
~~~json
{"B": "0x02"}
~~~

input iv and encrypted_flag into decrypt-file

flag:
crypto{n1c3_0n3_m4ll0ry!!!!!!!!}
